about_the_game:
In the game, you are a mini-car driver and carry out goods transport orders. The task seems simple - you need to reach the given loading place, for example factories, warehouses, sawmills and then deliver the cargo to the destination. Unfortunately, the terrain you work in is not easy…



The game offers a rich and realistic world, where you can travel across various areas. Each terrain has its own challenges and dangers. You must maneuver the vehicle in such a way as not to lose the goods. Each order has its own time, distance and reward. Show your driving skills, route planning and resource management skills to meet the requirements of the customers.



With the money you earn, you can make repairs and modifications to your car or expand your vehicle fleet. This way, you will be able to access various and better-paid orders. Remember that before each task, you must adapt your vehicle to the road conditions by selecting the appropriate tires, engine, suspension, fuel and load capacity.



The game also allows you to expand your own infrastructure. You can build gas stations, workshops, warehouses and other facilities that will make your work easier and increase your profits.

During the game, you will meet various characters who will influence your career and fate. Some of them will be your potential partners, others your friends or anemies. Your decisions and actions will have consequences that can change the course of the game.

Escape from the place where the devil says goodnight. Earn enough money to get out of your village, take part in elite competitions, and fulfill your biggest dreams!

This combination of strategy and adventure game provides many hours of fun and excitement, as well as the opportunity for exploration. Become a master of overcoming difficulties on the route!
